text: Shenzhen Metro Line 20 is a rapid transit line under construction in Shenzhen connecting Airport North with the International Exhibition Center. Construction started on 28 September 2016. The National Development and Reform Commission approved the project in March 2020. It was originally planned to open in 2018.
